name: @sv443/cfduc
description: A DNS update client for Cloudflare enabled domains

scripts.build: echo ! Building CloudflareDUC for every platform ! && npm run build-win && npm run build-linux && npm run build-mac
scripts.build-win: echo ! Building CloudflareDUC for Windows (x64 and x86) ! && npm run build-win-64 && npm run build-win-86
scripts.build-linux: echo ! Building CloudflareDUC for Linux ! && pkg -t node12-linux-x64 -o dist/CloudflareDUC-Linux .
scripts.build-mac: echo ! Building CloudflareDUC for MacOS ! && pkg -t node12-mac-x64 -o dist/CloudflareDUC-MacOS .
